Story_Texts.SourceString: The Frozen Delta wasn't always so... frozen.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: The Frozen Delta wasn't always so... frozen.

Story_Texts.SourceString: In years past, a vast river nurtured lush vegetation and elemental magic.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: In years past, a vast river nurtured lush vegetation and elemental magic.

Story_Texts.SourceString: The Great River snaked through the veins of the land, fed by dozens of tributaries.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: The Great River snaked through the veins of the land, fed by dozens of tributaries.

Story_Texts.SourceString: Now the power of the elements has faded, and the river’s water is still and frozen.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: Now the power of the elements has faded, and the river’s water is still and frozen.

Story_Texts.SourceString: There must be some powerful magic behind this. Rivers this big don’t just freeze over.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: There must be some powerful magic behind this. Rivers this big don’t just freeze over.

Story_Texts.SourceString: Maybe we can discover the cause if we explore.
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: Maybe we can discover the cause if we explore.

Story_Texts.SourceString: Mew better be vigilant and explore this area thoroughly!
Story_Texts.LocalizedString: Mew better be vigilant and explore this area thoroughly!
